articles.title: Supreme Court Seems Ready to Reject Efforts to Kick Trump Off the Ballot
articles.description: During oral arguments, justices from across the ideological spectrum expressed skepticism about Colorado's decision to disqualify Trump under the 14th Amendment's insurrection clause.

articles.title: Microsoft's AI Chief Leaves to Launch New AI Venture
articles.description: Sam Altman's successor at OpenAI, Kevin Scott, is departing Microsoft to start his own artificial intelligence company, marking another major shift in the AI industry leadership landscape.

articles.title: King Charles III Diagnosed With Cancer, Buckingham Palace Announces
articles.description: The British monarch has begun regular treatments and postponed public duties after cancer was discovered during his recent prostate procedure. The type of cancer has not been disclosed.
